pr_title: Strip Image text from expected typed answer

timeline.message:
NF: Extract TypedAnswer from CardViewer

CardViewer is too large - this refactoring helps abstract out concerns

Strip Image text from expected typed answer

The src was previously expected to by typed, which did not match Anki
Desktop's expectations

Fixes #6096

Strip Image text from expected typed answer

The src was previously expected to by typed, which did not match Anki
Desktop's expectations

Fixes #6096

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: The utility class name 'TypedAnswer' doesn't match '[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]+(Utils?|Helper|Constants)'
timeline.author: timrae
